summary: 2005 NISSAN MURANO. CONSUMER STATES ISSUES RELATED TO THE SEAT DAMAGE AND OTHER PROBLEMS WITH VEHICLE *TGW  THE CONSUMER STATED WHEN HER VEHICLE WAS RETURNED TO HER THE SEAT WAS BROKEN.  THE DEALERSHIP CLAIMED THEY DIDN'T DAMAGE THE SEAT AND THAT A SEAT WELD WAS BROKEN. THE DEALERSHIP IMPLIED THAT MAYBE THE CONSUMERS HUSBAND BROKE THE SEAT DUE TO HIS SIZE WHEN HE EXITED THE VEHICLE WHEN HE DROPPED IT OFF.  THE CONSUMER ALSO STATED SHE WAS CHARGED FOR RECALL WORK RELATING TO THE GAS TANK ASSEMBLY.  *JB
